name: Pricing Table
author: themesCode

sections.description:
Pricing Table is a responsive WordPress Pricing table plugin .TC Pricing Table helps to create unlimited clean and flat design based pricing table in your WordPress website.
You can add Unlimited packages with unlimited features.Your website visitors will easily understand and compair the features .

  • Upgrade To Pro »
  • View live Demos »
  • Documentations »
  • Support »
  • Send Message On Facebook »
  • How To Create A Website »

TC Pricing Table Free Features:

  • Responsive Pricing Table.
  • Simple and Light Weight.
  • Unlimited Tables.
  • Unlimited Featured Rows.
  • Table Header Row & Column background text color changeable.
  • Table body background text color changeable.
  • Call To Action Button background text color changeable.
  • Automatic Shortcode Generate for each Table.
  • Unlimited color for Table header.

TC Pricing Table Pro Features:

  • 10 different nice looking flat themes.
  • 5 different column in a row. 2,3,4,5,6 columns available in a row.
  • column box can be Rectangle and round shape.
  • Unlimited pricing tables, columns and rows.
  • Advanced settings for individual table.
  • Each table style,column,theme will be different.
  • Unlimited tables with unlimited rows and Columns can be created.
  • Column border normal and hover Color is changeable. Border can be hide or show.
  • Unlimited package features can be added . Just need to put a comma to separate them.
  • Column title , features, background normal and hover color is change able.
  • Action buttons background and text color is changeable.
  • Column title,subtitle ,price,features font size can be managed in the Topography settings.
  • Features texts can be highlighted with changeable color.
  • Mark any column to make it highlited/featured with ribbon.
  • 4 ribbons styles and the background color , text color are changeable.
  • Font Awesome icon support before features text.
  • Optimized coding standard,lightweight plugin.
  • Margin/space between columns can be enabled/disabled.

Video Tutorial for TC Pricing Table

Upgrade to Premium Now !
sections.installation:
Installing TC Pricing Table is easy like a regular WordPress plugin. Here goes the step by step Guide to Install TC Pricing Table plugin :

Install Plugin using WordPress Admin Panel Search Option

  • In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add New
  • Search TC Pricing Table
  • Click to install
  • Activate the plugin
  • TC Pricing Table post type will show below POSTS .

Install Plugin using Upload Method in WordPress Admin Panel

  • Download the latest version of TC Pricing Table (.zip file)
  • In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add New
  • click on the Upload Tab
  • Click on Choose File from your Hard Disk
  • Browse and Select downloaded tc-pricing-table.zip & click on Install Now button
  • Activate the plugin
  • TC Pricing Table type will show below POSTS.

Install Plugin using FTP Manager

  • Upload TC Pricing Table folder with all files inside the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  • Go to WordPress dashboard > Plugins & Activate the TC Pricing Table plugin
  • TC Pricing Table post type will show below POSTS with its owl icon.

Find Shortcode:
Go to TC Pricing Table > All Tables to see all the Tables you added until now. Mentioned columns will display here-

version 1.2

  • CSS list issue solved
  • Plan Features adding system changed. Add features and separate by comma .
  • Added html5 decimal number input support.

version 1.0

  • Initial release

version 1.1
